languages.text: Эвейн Винтерскейл прошел Магнэ Ацессио и стал новым Вольным Торговцем. Многие отмечали, что благородному Эвейну недоставало твердости в суде, зато в избытке он имел доверие даже к тем, кому доверять не стоило. Спасение его из системы Райкад и услуги, оказанные династией фон Валанциус Винтерскейлам, не были забыты молодым Вольным Торговцем.

Evayne Winterscale underwent his Magnae Accessio and became his dynasty's new Rogue Trader. Many said that noble Evayne lacked firmness of judgement, yet he had more than enough trust, even in those who were unworthy of it. The young Rogue Trader did not forget those who had saved him from the Rykad System or the favours that House von Valancius had bestowed on the Winterscales.
languages.original_text: Эвейн Винтерскейл прошел Магнэ Ацессио и стал новым Вольным Торговцем. He did not forget those who saved him from the Rykad system nor the favours that von Valancius bestowed on Winterscales.

languages.text: 艾维尼·温特斯凯尔举行了继任颂典，成为王朝的新任行商浪人。尽管许多人认为高贵的艾维尼优柔寡断，但他却敢于对他人报以信任，哪怕是那些不值得信任的人也不例外。这位年轻的行商浪人没有忘记是谁将他从莱卡德星系解救出来，也没有忘记冯·瓦兰修斯家族对温特斯凯尔家族的恩情。
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale underwent his Magnae Accessio and became his dynasty's new Rogue Trader. Many said that noble Evayne lacked firmness of judgement, yet he had more than enough trust, even in those who were unworthy of it. The young Rogue Trader did not forget those who had saved him from the Rykad System or the favours that House von Valancius had bestowed on the Winterscales.

traits.locale_text: 艾维尼·温特斯凯尔举行了继任颂典，成为了新任行商浪人。尽管许多人认为高贵的艾维尼优柔寡断，但他却敢于对他人报以信任，哪怕是那些不值得信任的人也不例外。这位年轻的行商浪人没有忘记是谁将他从莱卡德星系解救出来，也没有忘记冯·瓦兰修斯家族对温特斯凯尔家族的恩情。

languages.text: Evayne Winterzunder feierte seine Magnae Accessio und wurde zum neuen Freihändler seiner Dynastie. Viele sagten zwar, dem adligen Evayne fehle das feste Urteilsvermögen, doch er besaß sehr viel Vertrauensseligkeit, auch jenen gegenüber, die das nicht verdient hatten. Der junge Freihändler vergaß nie, wer ihn aus dem Rykad-System gerettet hatte oder welche Gunst das Haus Valancius den Winterzunders gewährt hatte.
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale underwent his Magnae Accessio and became his dynasty's new Rogue Trader. Many said that noble Evayne lacked firmness of judgement, yet he had more than enough trust, even in those who were unworthy of it. The young Rogue Trader did not forget those who had saved him from the Rykad System or the favours that House von Valancius had bestowed on the Winterscales.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterzunder feierte seine Magnae Accessio und wurde zu einem neuen Freihändler. Viele sagten zwar, dem adligen Evayne fehle das feste Urteilsvermögen, doch er besaß sehr viel Vertrauensseligkeit, auch für jene, die das nicht verdient hatten. Der junge Freihändler vergaß nie, wer ihn aus dem Rykad-System gerettet hatte oder welche Gunst das Haus Valancius den Winterzunders gewährt hatte.

languages.text: Evayne Winterscale fit sa Magnae Accessio et reçut ainsi le titre de libre-marchand de sa dynastie. Si de nombreuses personnes pensaient que le jugement du noble Evayne manquait de fermeté, sa confiance paraissait toutefois inépuisable, même pour ceux qui ne la méritaient pas. Le jeune libre-marchand n'oublia pas ceux qui l'avaient sauvé dans le système de Rykad ni les faveurs accordées aux Winterscale par la maison von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale underwent his Magnae Accessio and became his dynasty's new Rogue Trader. Many said that noble Evayne lacked firmness of judgement, yet he had more than enough trust, even in those who were unworthy of it. The young Rogue Trader did not forget those who had saved him from the Rykad System or the favours that House von Valancius had bestowed on the Winterscales.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterscale fit sa Magnae Accessio et reçut ainsi le titre de libre-marchand. Bien des gens pensaient que le jugement du noble Evayne manquait de fermeté, mais sa confiance paraissait inépuisable, même pour ceux qui ne la méritaient pas. Le jeune libre-marchand n'oublia pas ceux qui l'avaient sauvé dans le système de Rykad ni les faveurs accordées aux Winterscale par la maison von Valancius.

languages.text: Evayne Winterscale superó su Magnae Accessio y se convirtió en el nuevo Comerciante Independiente de su dinastía. Muchos decían que el noble Evayne no tenía suficiente capacidad de juicio, pero sí confianza de sobra, incluso para aquellos que no la merecían. El joven Comerciante Independiente no olvidó quién le salvó del sistema Rykad ni los favores que la casa von Valancius otorgó a los Winterscale.
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale underwent his Magnae Accessio and became his dynasty's new Rogue Trader. Many said that noble Evayne lacked firmness of judgement, yet he had more than enough trust, even in those who were unworthy of it. The young Rogue Trader did not forget those who had saved him from the Rykad System or the favours that House von Valancius had bestowed on the Winterscales.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterscale superó su Magnae Accessio y se convirtió en un nuevo Comerciante Independiente. Muchos decían que el noble Evayne no tenía suficiente capacidad de juicio, pero sí confianza de sobra, incluso para aquellos que no la merecían. El joven Comerciante Independiente no olvidó quién lo salvó del sistema Rykad ni los favores que la casa von Valancius otorgó a los Winterscale.

languages.text: エヴァイン・ウィンタースケールはマグナ・アクセシオの儀を終えて、王朝の新たな自由開拓者となった。エヴァインは出自が高貴なだけに判断力の強さに欠けると見る向きは多かったが、彼は周囲を十二分に信頼しており、それは下々の者にまで向けられていた。若き自由開拓者は、ライカド星系で自らを救った恩人や、ウィンタースケールの面々がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に受けた恩を忘れてはいなかったのだ。
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale underwent his Magnae Accessio and became his dynasty's new Rogue Trader. Many said that noble Evayne lacked firmness of judgement, yet he had more than enough trust, even in those who were unworthy of it. The young Rogue Trader did not forget those who had saved him from the Rykad System or the favours that House von Valancius had bestowed on the Winterscales.

traits.locale_text: エヴァイン・ウィンタースケールはマグナ・アクセシオの儀を終えて、王朝の新たな自由開拓者となった。エヴァインは出自が高貴なだけに判断力の強さに欠けると見る向きは多かったが、彼は周囲を十二分に信頼しており、それは下々の者にまで向けられていた。若き自由開拓者は、ライカド星系で自らを救った恩人や、ウィンタースケールの面々がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に受けた恩を忘れてはいなかったのだ。

languages.text: Evayne Winterscale, Magnae Accessio'dan geçip hanedanlığının yeni Hür Tacir'i oldu. Birçokları, soylu Evayne'in adaletin gerektirdiği sertlikten yoksun olduğunu söylerken o, güvenilmeye hak etmeyenlere dahi itimat ediyordu. Genç Hür Tacir, onu Rykad Sistemi'nden kurtaranları ya da von Valancius Hanesi'nin Winterscalelere yaptığı iyilikleri unutmadı.
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale underwent his Magnae Accessio and became his dynasty's new Rogue Trader. Many said that noble Evayne lacked firmness of judgement, yet he had more than enough trust, even in those who were unworthy of it. The young Rogue Trader did not forget those who had saved him from the Rykad System or the favours that House von Valancius had bestowed on the Winterscales.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterscale, Magnae Accessio'dan geçti ve hanedanlığının yeni Hür Tacir'i hâline geldi. Birçokları soylu Evayne'in, adaletin gerektirdiği sertlikten yoksun olduğunu söylüyordu ancak o, bünyesinde bol bol güven ihtiva ediyordu. Bu güvene layık olmayanlar için bile. Genç Hür Tacir, onu Rykad Sistemi'nden kurtaranları ya da von Valancius Hanesi'nin Winterscalelere yaptığı iyilikleri unutmadı.
